TextView.android:text: Today The Sun and Mercury move into your solar fourth house today, dear Aries, and after a hectic period, you now seek out more familiarity, comfort, quiet, and private time. Mars is already in this sector of your chart, and with so much attention to--and investment of energy in -- your personal life, this is a good time to improve relations with family and living conditions. Today, there can be big ideas and meaningful conversations or ideas related to long-term projects, improving security, family, and home
